name: snippet-from-file
description: Insert snippets from file (and automatically fold regions)

commands.title: snippet-from-file: Insert snippet and fold all regions

snippet-from-file.snippets.description: Configure titles and directories of your snippets

snippet-from-file.addregion.description: Whether to add the region delimiter before/after your snippet

snippet-from-file.beginregion.description: The region delimiter for each language extension before your snippet (string `<SNIPPETNAME>` will be replaced to your snippet title)

snippet-from-file.endregion.description: The region delimiter for each language extension after your snippet (string `<SNIPPETNAME>` will be replaced to your snippet title)

snippet-from-file.addregionexcept.description: Specify the snippet (path) that you don't want to add the region delimiter

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
